thread.title: A Question for U.K. Ministers: What Were You After With Brexit?

author: Simon Nixon
title: A Question for U.K. Ministers: What Were You After With Brexit?
text:
As British government ministers head to Chequers, the prime minister’s country house, to try again to agree on a Brexit strategy, they might usefully ask themselves a simple question: What exactly are they trying to achieve? 

After a week of speechifying by ministers, it is easier to identify what the government wants to stay the same than to change. Prime Minister Theresa May wants no change to the U.K.’s security cooperation with EU, which means continued participation in the European Arrest Warrant and Europol; Foreign...
